name: Read FB messages without "seen HH:MM" showing up
description:
With this style you can see more of a message with out having to click on it. When you see a message from your inbox, or the message pop up, you friends/family will not be notified of the dreaded "seen HH:MM" message.

**Works for both the inbox, and the pop out messages**
additional_info:
The message previews are limited to 200 characters, after that you would have to click the message to see all of it.

Check out my other styles:
- style 91126
- style 90673
- style 88250
- style 76588
- style 75952
- style 93706
